name: Monster Crawl: Warrior
description:
Monster Crawl: Warrior is the FREE version of Monster Crawl and includes:
  • One of 3 heroes, the Warrior
  • First Boss, the Rat King
  • 4 Crawls featuring multiple dungeons
  • Selected Relics and Unlocks
  • Monster tiers 1 and 2
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2027510


  • Slaughter hoards of monsters in fun fast-paced arcade action
  • Progress through multiple dungeon crawls with different challenges
  • Short run based gameplay lasting 20-30 minutes

  • Discover Relic rooms, open the chests, and choose!
  • Leave a trail of fire; summon mini bombs as you run
  • Create portals and abuse them; throw a giant hammer
  • Add deadly shrapnel to explosions; use monster parts as weapons
  • Fly over traps; gain double dodge
  • Punch monsters away; use your gold as a weapon
  • Gain pets, then power them up


  • Explore wide open areas, packed mazes, switches and portal madness
  • Treasures, keys, doors, bombs, traps and secrets
  • Battle a variety of monsters, each with different abilities and challenge levels


  • Progress though multiple Monster Bosses, from Rat King to Ultimate Death
  • Unlock Boss Relics with run-changing effects


  • 3 heroes with different unique attacks - Warrior, Ranger and Wizard
  • Collect gems to level up your hero, add or modify attacks
  • Experiment with an endless combination of effects

  • Spend gold between runs to unlock new gameplay options
  • Increase the power of Relics found within the dungeons

  • Team up to crush your enemies with local co-op
  • Steam Remote Play compatible
  • Requires controller for second player
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2027510
